name: The point of no return (Aaron Shirsefat)
name_original: The point of no return (Aaron Shirsefat)
description:
Gregory Bens is a single parent who wants nothing but the best for his daughter Hazel. However between Greg's busy schedule, and trying his hardest to give Hazel the birthday she deserves, Greg notices that something isn't right. Perhaps he should've been a bit more careful..

Somethings you can't run away from.
